ports.name: Element
ports.text: The HTML DOM element to add the listener to

ports.name: Use Capture
ports.text: If multiple elements register an event listener, setting `Use Capture` will make sure the listener will be called before the regular (bubble) listeners. For more infos read here: [javascript.info/bubbling-and-capturing](https://javascript.info/bubbling-and-capturing).

ports.name: Prevent Default
ports.text: If set the default browser action for the event will not be executed. See [developer.mozilla.org](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Event/preventDefault).
